listitem.simpara: &ucsUAS; now supports display names for school OU objects. They are shown within the &ucsUAS; modules. During creation of an school OU the display name has to be entered. The internal LDAP name of the school OU objects is derived from the display name automatically but may be modified manually (Bug 34173, Bug 34264).
The import script create_ou now supports the new command line argument --displayname for defining a display name for school OU objects (Bug 34173).

Starting from &ucsUAS; 3.2R2 the import script create_ou does not create automatically domaincontroller slave objects for the administrative network. The old behaviour may be restored by setting the &ucsUCR; variable ucsschool/ldap/default/dcs back to edukativ verwaltung. New slaves for the administrative network may be installed via the &ucsUAS; installer (Bug 26137).

The import script create_ou now supports an additional argument for creating a management DC. Additionally a new script create_dc has been added that enables the admin to create a management DCs for a school OU retrospectively (Bug 34166, Bug 26137).
A typo in the CLI tool rename_class has been fixed that could lead to a traceback in certain error conditions (Bug 34209).
The CLI tool rename_class does no longer rename the class share object if renaming of the group share object failed (Bug 34737).
The LDAP schema for &ucsUAS; has been modified to support the attribute displayName at school OU objects (Bug 34173).

simpara.package: ucs-school-netlogon-user-logonscripts now creates a desktop link to the UMC of the school DC for tearcher accounts, configurable via the &ucsUCR; variables ucsschool/userlogon/umclink/re and ucsschool/userlogon/umclink/link (Bug 22737).

listitem.simpara: A logic error has been fixed that may occurred if the same internet rule was assigned to more than one room (Bug 34557).
&ucsUAS; has been prepared for an upcoming UCS erratum which enables &ucsUAS; to enable the configurable handling of the HTTP header X-Forwarded-For by the proxy squid (Bug 34773).
The &ucsUAS; configuration wizard is now also able to create administrative school servers (Bug 34166).
The wizard for installing UCS@school does now support the additional attribute displayName (Bug 34173).
The wizard for creating schools does now support the additional attribute displayName (Bug 34173).
Some faulty error message in exam module's logfile are now avoided by additional pre-checks. Additionally new security checks have been added for frontend data (Bug 33456).
Some internal shell functions within shell-ucs-school have been improved and fixed (Bug 33506).
The methodname isAdim has been changed into isAdmin within the UCS@school programming library (Bug 34259).
Additional ucs-test scripts have been added for the &ucsUAS; testsuite (Bug 34279, Bug 34280, Bug 34281, Bug 34557).
Various UCS@school UMC modules have been enabled to work in district mode (Bug 31407).
